channel.title: Free ringtones from verizon. 12/31 only
channel.description:
It was on a 3 second commercial. It tells you to text tone to 2007, and it just gives you instructions on how to get the ringtone. Ill save you the text message and tell you. It says to go to "get it now", then chose get new ringtone (not vcast music), then open up your verizon ringtones app. After that, just find the song you want, and select purchase. when you hit purchase you are promted with two options. select the second option and enter "2007" as your redemtion code.
yay?
completely free and no strings attatched. Be skeptical if you want, but just go ahead and do it. You should probably reside in the US though, I dont know of the terms and agreements in other countries

item.title: Free ringtones from verizon. 12/31 only
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

ok i got this back. i dnno tho it sounds a little “iffy” because it doesnt look like a verizon message. here is exactly how it says it

2get ur free ringtone go2 get it now on phone> tunes&tones>get new ringtone>VZW tones>get tones>select and purchase song>option 2 redemption code> enter 2007.

should i do it???

Read full topic

item.title: Free ringtones from verizon. 12/31 only
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

no strings attatched. its straight from the verizon app. My sister and Dad both got a song, completely free. Then he called up verizon to see if they billed him for it. Its completely free

this isnt like those cheap commercials you see where it says to text N23 to 55455 and get a ringtone for only 99 cents, then it turns out to charge you 10 times, as well as charge you 5 bucks for the text message.

Read full topic

item.title: Free ringtones from verizon. 12/31 only

item.description:

no i think they charge you for it. because that would be so many free downloads.
